# Schema.Relationship.DeleteRule.deny

**Case**

A rule that prevents the deletion of a model because it contains one or more references to other models.

## Declaration

```swift
case deny
```

## Accessing delete rules

- **Schema.Relationship.DeleteRule.cascade**: A rule that deletes any related models.
- **Schema.Relationship.DeleteRule.noAction**: A rule that doesn’t make changes to any related models.
- **Schema.Relationship.DeleteRule.nullify**: A rule that nullifies the related model’s reference to the deleted model.
